jnipap
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  jnipap.Connection

public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object

A class containing a connection to the NIPAP XML-RPC server This class is used by all NIPAP mapped objects to obtain a connection to the NIPAP XML-RPC server.

Creates a connection. Used by subclasses where the class is instanciated before the options are known.

Method Detail

setup

protected void setup()
Set up the connection objects.

setUsername

public void setUsername(java.lang.String username)
Impersonate other user. This function is used to set a different username than the one used for authentication as responsible for the changes. For this to work, the user used for authentication must be "trusted", which means that it has permission to impersonate other users.

Parameters:
username - Username which will be responsible for all actions.

authMap

public java.util.Map authMap()
Return a Map-representation of the auth options

Returns:
Map of authentication options
